Title: How else can we elevate our APOC brand and/or what would you like to see more around our office?

What else do you think can help you with your career development here?
And/or what other topics would you like to see from the sessions? (eg soft skills, technical skills, any specific topics)

If your previous answer was No, please let us know why below. 

If your answer was Yes or No, please tell us what other type of CSR activities interest you? (eg fund-raising, home/hospital visits, environmental causes, children & education, skills-based giving etc)
What other initiatives or topics would you like to see for D&I? (eg gender, race/ethnicity, sexual orientation, body image, mindset change/tolerance)
What other types of site events would you enjoy? (eg cocktails/social gatherings, hobby related, fitness/sports etc)
Any other suggestion/feedback on MS Poll or awards & recognition at APOC?
Lastly, any suggestions on how we can celebrate our 20th year anniversary? (we will not be going off-site)
